duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the daily functions of one or more handscoring contracts, including scheduling, resource planning, and coordinating with program and project managers.
Develop item specific training, coordinate with scoring team, and perform post-project work and data analysis.
Apply science expertise in item development and scoring process, including meetings with clients and educators.
Communicate with various roles via chat, email, phone, reports, and videoconference meetings.
Mentor and train Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers, as well as provide live and pre-recorded training for Science and Math assessments.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Life Science or Physical Sciences (Master’s preferred)
Two (2) years assessment industry experience as a Scoring Director or other scoring team lead or equivalent experience
